name: Untethered (itch) (Drewmanfu)
description:
Your tether has broken and you have drifted very far from your station can you make it back in time before you run out of air? Or worse get your self crushed by spinning rocks?

.

How was your jamming experience? Were you able to produce more or less than you expected? For this small game I believe we got some thing good done

How did you apply the theme to your entry? I, Well the game does take place in space it self not very creative in that department but what can I say it was what me and Stephen agreed on in the end
